song.title: Hold On
song.lyrics:
I was doom riding on top a black horse whatever prize there was I could only observe where the trouble starts where does it end? I cannot be cured before it ends
I know life would be different if I held on (held on) I know I could be something if I held on
Gave her love away put it in my pocket when it should've been framed oh, it lost its shine gotta get this out of my head out of my brain how could it end, end like this? how could it end?
I know life would be different had I held on (held on) I know I could be something had I held on (held on) I know I could be something if I held on (held on) I know life would be different if I held on (held on)
held on held on, if I held on held on, if I held on held on, if I held on held on
